name: wc-refund-returns-page
title: Setup a Refund and Returns Policy page to boost your store's credibility.
content: We have created a sample draft Refund and Returns Policy page for you. Please have a look and update it to fit your store.

name: wc-admin-wc-helper-connection
title: Connect to WooCommerce.com
content: Connect to get important product notifications and updates.

name: new_in_app_marketplace_2021
title: Customize your store with extensions
content: Check out our NEW Extensions tab to see our favorite extensions for customizing your store, and discover the most popular extensions in the WooCommerce Marketplace.

name: wayflyer_bnpl_q4_2021
title: Grow your business with funding through Wayflyer
content: Fast, flexible financing to boost cash flow and help your business grow – one fee, no interest rates, penalties, equity, or personal guarantees. Based on your store’s performance, Wayflyer provides funding and analytical insights to invest in your business.

name: wc_shipping_mobile_app_usps_q4_2021
title: Print and manage your shipping labels with WooCommerce Shipping and the WooCommerce Mobile App
content: Save time by printing, purchasing, refunding, and tracking shipping labels generated by WooCommerce Shipping – all directly from your mobile device!

name: woocommerce-services
title: WooCommerce Shipping & Tax
content: WooCommerce Shipping & Tax helps get your store "ready to sell" as quickly as possible. You create your products. We take care of tax calculation, payment processing, and shipping label printing! Learn more about the extension that you just installed.

name: your-first-product
title: Your first product
content:
That’s huge! You’re well on your way to building a successful online store — now it’s time to think about how you’ll fulfill your orders.

Read our shipping guide to learn best practices and options for putting together your shipping strategy. And for WooCommerce stores in the United States, you can print discounted shipping labels via USPS with WooCommerce Shipping.

name: wc-admin-optimizing-the-checkout-flow
title: Optimizing the checkout flow
content: It’s crucial to get your store’s checkout as smooth as possible to avoid losing sales. Let’s take a look at how you can optimize the checkout experience for your shoppers.

name: wc-payments-qualitative-feedback
title: WooPayments setup - let us know what you think
content: Congrats on enabling WooPayments for your store. Please share your feedback in this 2 minute survey to help us improve the setup process.

name: share-your-feedback-on-paypal
title: Share your feedback on PayPal
content: Share your feedback in this 2 minute survey about how we can make the process of accepting payments more useful for your store.

name: google_listings_and_ads_install
title: Drive traffic and sales with Google
content: Reach online shoppers to drive traffic and sales for your store by showcasing products across Google, for free or with ads.

name: wc-subscriptions-security-update-3-0-15
title: WooCommerce Subscriptions security update!
content:
We recently released an important security update to WooCommerce Subscriptions. To ensure your site’s data is protected, please upgrade WooCommerce Subscriptions to version 3.0.15 or later.

Click the button below to view and update to the latest Subscriptions version, or log in to WooCommerce.com Dashboard and navigate to your Downloads page.

We recommend always using the latest version of WooCommerce Subscriptions, and other software running on your site, to ensure maximum security.

If you have any questions we are here to help — just open a ticket.

name: woocommerce-core-update-5-4-0
title: Update to WooCommerce 5.4.1 now
content: WooCommerce 5.4.1 addresses a checkout issue discovered in WooCommerce 5.4. We recommend upgrading to WooCommerce 5.4.1 as soon as possible.

name: wcpay-promo-2020-11
title: wcpay-promo-2020-11
content: wcpay-promo-2020-11

name: wcpay-promo-2020-12
title: wcpay-promo-2020-12
content: wcpay-promo-2020-12

name: ppxo-pps-upgrade-paypal-payments-1
title: Get the latest PayPal extension for WooCommerce
content:
Heads up! There’s a new PayPal on the block!

Now is a great time to upgrade to our latest PayPal extension to continue to receive support and updates with PayPal.

Get access to a full suite of PayPal payment methods, extensive currency and country coverage, and pay later options with the all-new PayPal extension for WooCommerce.

name: ppxo-pps-upgrade-paypal-payments-2
title: Upgrade your PayPal experience!
content:
Get access to a full suite of PayPal payment methods, extensive currency and country coverage, offer subscription and recurring payments, and the new PayPal pay later options.

Start using our latest PayPal today to continue to receive support and updates.

name: woocommerce-core-sqli-july-2021-need-to-update
title: Action required: Critical vulnerabilities in WooCommerce
content:
In response to a critical vulnerability identified on July 13, 2021, we are working with the WordPress Plugins Team to deploy software updates to stores running WooCommerce (versions 3.3 to 5.5) and the WooCommerce Blocks feature plugin (versions 2.5 to 5.5).

Our investigation into this vulnerability is ongoing, but we wanted to let you know now about the importance of updating immediately.

For more information on which actions you should take, as well as answers to FAQs, please urgently review our blog post detailing this issue.

name: woocommerce-blocks-sqli-july-2021-need-to-update
title: Action required: Critical vulnerabilities in WooCommerce Blocks
content:
In response to a critical vulnerability identified on July 13, 2021, we are working with the WordPress Plugins Team to deploy software updates to stores running WooCommerce (versions 3.3 to 5.5) and the WooCommerce Blocks feature plugin (versions 2.5 to 5.5).

Our investigation into this vulnerability is ongoing, but we wanted to let you know now about the importance of updating immediately.

For more information on which actions you should take, as well as answers to FAQs, please urgently review our blog post detailing this issue.

name: woocommerce-core-sqli-july-2021-store-patched
title: Solved: Critical vulnerabilities patched in WooCommerce
content:
In response to a critical vulnerability identified on July 13, 2021, we worked with the WordPress Plugins Team to deploy software updates to stores running WooCommerce (versions 3.3 to 5.5) and the WooCommerce Blocks feature plugin (versions 2.5 to 5.5).

Your store has been updated to the latest secure version(s). For more information and answers to FAQs, please review our blog post detailing this issue.

name: woocommerce-blocks-sqli-july-2021-store-patched
title: Solved: Critical vulnerabilities patched in WooCommerce Blocks
content:
In response to a critical vulnerability identified on July 13, 2021, we worked with the WordPress Plugins Team to deploy software updates to stores running WooCommerce (versions 3.3 to 5.5) and the WooCommerce Blocks feature plugin (versions 2.5 to 5.5).

Your store has been updated to the latest secure version(s). For more information and answers to FAQs, please review our blog post detailing this issue.

name: habit-moment-survey
title: We’re all ears! Share your experience so far with WooCommerce
content: We’d love your input to shape the future of WooCommerce together. Feel free to share any feedback, ideas or suggestions that you have.

name: woocommerce-core-paypal-march-2022-updated
title: Security auto-update of WooCommerce
content: Your store has been updated to the latest secure version of WooCommerce. We worked with WordPress to deploy PayPal Standard security updates for stores running WooCommerce (version 3.5 to 6.3). It’s recommended to disable PayPal Standard, and use PayPal Payments to accept PayPal.

name: woocommerce-core-paypal-march-2022-updated-nopp
title: Security auto-update of WooCommerce
content: Your store has been updated to the latest secure version of WooCommerce. We worked with WordPress to deploy security updates related to PayPal Standard payment gateway for stores running WooCommerce (version 3.5 to 6.3).

name: pinterest_03_2022_update
title: Your Pinterest for WooCommerce plugin is out of date!
content: Update to the latest version of Pinterest for WooCommerce to continue using this plugin and keep your store connected with Pinterest. To update, visit Plugins > Installed Plugins, and click on “update now” under Pinterest for WooCommerce.

name: store_setup_survey_survey_q2_2022
title: How is your store setup going?
content:
Our goal is to make sure you have all the right tools to start setting up your store in the smoothest way possible.
We’d love to know if we hit our mark and how we can improve. To collect your thoughts, we made a 2-minute survey.

name: wc-admin-wisepad3
title: Take your business on the go in Canada with WooCommerce In-Person Payments
content: Quickly create new orders, accept payment in person for orders placed online, and automatically sync your inventory – no matter where your business takes you. With WooCommerce In-Person Payments and the WisePad 3 card reader, you can bring the power of your store anywhere.

name: woocommerce-payments-august-2022-need-to-update
title: Action required: Please update WooCommerce Payments
content: An updated secure version of WooCommerce Payments is available – please ensure that you’re using the latest patch version. For more information on what action you need to take, please review the article below.

name: woocommerce-payments-august-2022-store-patched
title: WooCommerce Payments has been automatically updated
content: You’re now running the latest secure version of WooCommerce Payments. We’ve worked with the WordPress Plugins team to deploy a security update to stores running WooCommerce Payments (version 3.9 to 4.5). For further information, please review the article below.

name: google_listings_ads_custom_attribute_mapping_q4_2022
title: Our latest improvement to the Google Listings & Ads extension: Attribute Mapping
content: You spoke, we listened. This new feature enables you to easily upload your products, customize your product attributes in one place, and target shoppers with more relevant ads. Extend how far your ad dollars go with each campaign.

name: needs-update-eway-payment-gateway-rin-2022-12-20
title: Security vulnerability patched in WooCommerce Eway Gateway
content:
In response to a potential vulnerability identified in WooCommerce Eway Gateway versions 3.1.0 to 3.5.0, we’ve worked to deploy security fixes and have released an updated version.
No external exploits have been detected, but we recommend you update to your latest supported version 3.1.26, 3.2.3, 3.3.1, 3.4.6, or 3.5.1

name: updated-eway-payment-gateway-rin-2022-12-20
title: WooCommerce Eway Gateway has been automatically updated
content: Your store is now running the latest secure version of WooCommerce Eway Gateway. We worked with the WordPress Plugins team to deploy a software update to stores running WooCommerce Eway Gateway (versions 3.1.0 to 3.5.0) in response to a security vulnerability that was discovered.

name: ecomm-wc-navigation-survey-2023
title: Navigating WooCommerce on WordPress.com
content: We are improving the WooCommerce navigation on WordPress.com and would love your help to make it better! Please share your experience with us in this 2-minute survey.

name: google_listings_ads_pmax_i1_q1_2023_no_gla
title: Create more engaging ads – without the hard work
content: Get in front of millions of shoppers searching for products like yours with Google Listings & Ads. With new customization features, Google automatically tests multiple combinations of text and images to create the most engaging ad to boost your business. Plus, get up to $500 in ad credit – terms and conditions apply.

name: google_listings_ads_pmax_i1_q1_2023_with_gla
title: New customization features to boost your business
content: You can now add custom images, messaging, and URLs to campaigns in Google Listings & Ads. Google then automatically tests multiple combinations to create the most engaging version to help boost your business. Get more sales with dynamic content – edit an existing campaign or create a new ad now.

name: woocommerce-wcpay-march-2023-update-needed
title: Action required: Security update for WooCommerce Payments
content: Your store requires a security update for WooCommerce Payments. Please update to the latest version of WooCommerce Payments immediately to address a potential vulnerability discovered on March 22. For more information on how to update, visit this WooCommerce Developer Blog Post.

name: tap_to_pay_iphone_q2_2023_no_wcpay
title: Accept in-person contactless payments on your iPhone
content: Tap to Pay on iPhone and WooCommerce Payments is quick, secure, and simple to set up — no extra terminals or card readers are needed. Accept contactless debit and credit cards, Apple Pay, and other NFC digital wallets in person.

name: tap_to_pay_iphone_q2_2023_with_wcpay
title: New: accept in-person contactless payments on your iPhone
content: Tap to Pay on iPhone is quick, secure, and simple to set up in WooCommerce Payments — no extra terminals or card readers are needed. Accept contactless debit and credit cards, Apple Pay, and other NFC digital wallets in person in a few short steps!

name: woocommerce-WCPreOrders-april-2023-update-needed
title: Action required: Security update of WooCommerce Pre-Orders extension
content: Your store requires a security update for the WooCommerce Pre-Orders extension. Please update the WooCommerce Pre-Orders extension immediately to address a potential vulnerability discovered on April 11.

name: wc-admin-wcpay-denmark-Q2-2023
title: WooCommerce Payments is now available in Denmark!
content: We’ve recently released WooCommerce Payments in Denmark. You can view and manage transactions right in your WordPress dashboard while securely accepting major cards, Apple Pay, and payments in over 100 currencies.

name: wc-admin-customizing-product-catalog
title: How to customize your product catalog
content: You want your product catalog and images to look great and align with your brand. This guide will give you all the tips you need to get your products looking great in your store.

name: wc-admin-choosing-a-theme
title: Choosing a theme?
content: Check out the themes that are compatible with WooCommerce and choose one aligned with your brand and business needs.

name: wc-admin-mobile-app
title: Install Woo mobile app
content: Install the WooCommerce mobile app to manage orders, receive sales notifications, and view key metrics — wherever you are.

name: wc-admin-onboarding-payments-reminder
title: Start accepting payments on your store!
content: Take payments with the provider that’s right for you - choose from 100+ payment gateways for WooCommerce.

name: wc-admin-usage-tracking-opt-in
title: Help WooCommerce improve with usage tracking
content: Gathering usage data allows us to improve WooCommerce. Your store will be considered as we evaluate new features, judge the quality of an update, or determine if an improvement makes sense. You can always visit the Settings and choose to stop sharing data. Read more about what data we collect.

name: wc-admin-woocommerce-payments
title: Try the new way to get paid
content:
Securely accept credit and debit cards on your site. Manage transactions without leaving your WordPress dashboard. Only with WooPayments.

By clicking "Get started", you agree to our Terms of Service

name: woopay-beta-merchantrecruitment-04MAY23
title: Increase conversions with WooPay — our fastest checkout yet
content:
WooPay, a new express checkout feature built into WooCommerce Payments, is now available —and we’re inviting you to be one of the first to try it.

Boost conversions by offering your customers a simple, secure way to pay with a single click.

Get started in seconds.

name: wc_admin_BNPL_WCPay_coming-soon_Q1_2023
title: Buy now, pay later is heading to WooCommerce Payments
content: Great news: full integration with Afterpay and Affirm is on its way to WooCommerce Payments! You’ll soon be able to increase your order values, sell more, and offer customers a payment option they’ll love — with no extra downloads or extensions required.

name: woopay-beta-merchantrecruitment-update-04MAY23
title: Increase conversions with WooPay — our fastest checkout yet
content:
WooPay, a new express checkout feature built into WooCommerce Payments, is now available — and you’re invited to try it.

Boost conversions by offering your customers a simple, secure way to pay with a single click.

Update WooCommerce Payments to get started.

name: woopay-beta-existingmerchants-noaction-27APR23
title: WooPay is back!
content:
Thanks for previously trying WooPay, the express checkout feature built into WooCommerce Payments. We’re excited to announce that WooPay availability has resumed. No action is required on your part.

You can now continue boosting conversions by offering your customers a simple, secure way to pay with a single click.

name: woopay-beta-existingmerchants-update-27APR23
title: WooPay is back!
content:
Thanks for previously trying WooPay, the express checkout feature built into WooCommerce Payments. We’re excited to announce that WooPay availability has resumed.

Update to the latest WooCommerce Payments version to continue boosting conversions by offering your customers a simple, secure way to pay with a single click.

Boost conversions by letting customers pay with a single click.

name: payoneer_q2_2023
title: Grow with the next generation of payment processing
content: Ready to stand out in the new global economy? Payoneer Checkout gives you the power to securely accept payments worldwide, build a checkout that customers love, and manage your store’s transactions and finances – all from the same place.

name: ipp_refresh_q2_2023_us_inbox_notification
title: Grow on the go with in-person payments
content: Sell your products or services on the go with the M2 card reader – a quick, synchronized, and secure way to take payments, no matter where you are. Create an order using the WooCommerce mobile app and connect your card reader to accept payments.

name: ipp_refresh_q2_2023_ca_inbox_notification
title: Grow on the go with in-person payments
content: Sell your products or services on the go with the WisePad 3 card reader – a quick, synchronized, and secure way to take payments, no matter where you are. Create an order using the WooCommerce mobile app and connect your card reader to accept payments.

name: product_management_card_sorting
title: How do you create and edit products?
content: Have a say in the future of WooCommerce. Take part in a brief exercise and help us understand what information is important to you while editing products.

name: woocommerce-WCstripe-May-2023-updated-needed
title: Action required: Security update of WooCommerce Stripe plugin
content: Your store requires a security update for the WooCommerce Stripe plugin. Please update the WooCommerce Stripe plugin immediately to address a potential vulnerability.

name: woocommerce-WCReturnsWarranty-June-2023-updated-needed
title: Action required: Security update of WooCommerce Returns and Warranty Requests extension
content: Your store requires a security update for the Returns and Warranty Requests extension. Please update to the latest version of the WooCommerce Returns and Warranty Requests extension immediately to address a potential vulnerability discovered on May 31.

name: woocommerce-WCPayments-June-2023-updated-needed
title: Action required: Security update of WooCommerce Payments
content: Your store requires a security update for the WooCommerce Payments plugin. Please update the WooCommerce Payments plugin immediately to address a potential vulnerability.

name: woocommerce-WCSubscriptions-June-2023-updated-needed
title: Action required: Security update of WooCommerce Subscriptions
content: Your store requires a security update for the WooCommerce Subscriptions plugin. Please update the WooCommerce Subscriptions plugin immediately to address a potential vulnerability.

name: woocommerce_hpos_1st_notification_q2_2023
title: High-Performance Order Storage (HPOS) is on its way
content: Our team is targeting August 2023 to roll out a major database upgrade that can unlock faster checkout and order creation for your customers — and lightning-quick order lookup for you. Enablement is optional and you won’t be forced to update, but read on to see why this was our most requested new feature.

name: woocommerce-WCOPC-June-2023-updated-needed
title: Action required: Security update of WooCommerce One Page Checkout
content: Your shop requires a security update to address a vulnerability in the WooCommerce One Page Checkout extension. The fix for this vulnerability was released for this extension on June 13th. Please update immediately.

name: woocommerce-WCGC-July-2023-update-needed
title: Action required: Security update of WooCommerce GoCardless Extension
content: Your shop requires a security update to address a vulnerability in the WooCommerce GoCardless extension. The fix for this vulnerability was released on July 4th. Please update immediately.

name: wc-admin-wcpay-bulgaria-Q2-2023
title: WooCommerce Payments is now available in Bulgaria!
content: We’ve recently released WooCommerce Payments in Bulgaria. You can view and manage transactions right in your WordPress dashboard while securely accepting major cards, Apple Pay, and payments in over 100 currencies.

name: wc-admin-wcpay-czechia-Q2-2023

content: We’ve recently released WooCommerce Payments in Czechia. You can view and manage transactions right in your WordPress dashboard while securely accepting major cards, Apple Pay, and payments in over 100 currencies.

name: wc-admin-wcpay-sweden-Q2-2023

content: We’ve recently released WooCommerce Payments in Sweden. You can view and manage transactions right in your WordPress dashboard while securely accepting major cards, Apple Pay, and payments in over 100 currencies.

name: woocommerce-shipping-fedex-api-outage-2023-07-16
title: Scheduled FedEx API outage — July 2023
content: On July 16 there will be a full outage of the FedEx API from 04:00 to 08:00 AM UTC. Due to planned maintenance by FedEx, you'll be unable to provide FedEx shipping rates during this time. Follow the link below for more information and recommendations on how to minimize impact.

name: square_payments_q3_2023
title: Square for WooCommerce
content: Connect your Square account with WooCommerce to accept online and in-person payments (including contactless payments and cross-channel gift cards) quickly and securely. Save time by syncing sales, customers, and items and inventory — and manage everything through one centralized platform.

name: wcship-2023-07-hazmat-update-needed
title: Action required: USPS HAZMAT compliance update for WooCommerce Shipping & Tax extension
content: Your store requires an update for the WooCommerce Shipping extension. Please update to the latest version of the WooCommerce Shipping & Tax extension immediately to ensure compliance with new USPS HAZMAT rules currently in effect.

name: wc-admin-real-time-order-alerts
title: Get real-time order alerts anywhere
content: Get notifications about store activity, including new orders and product reviews directly on your mobile devices with the Woo app.

name: woocommerce-WCStripe-Aug-2023-update-needed
title: Action required: Security update for WooCommerce Stripe plugin
content: Your shop requires an important security update for the WooCommerce Stripe plugin. The fix for this vulnerability was released on July 31. Please update immediately.

name: woocommerce-WCStripe-Aug-2023-security-updated
title: Security update of WooCommerce Stripe plugin
content: Your store has been updated to the latest secure version of the WooCommerce Stripe plugin. This update was released on July 31.

name: woocommerce-WooPayments-Aug-2023-update-needed
title: Action required: Security update for WooPayments (WooCommerce Payments) plugin
content: Your shop requires an important security update for the WooPayments (WooCommerce Payments) extension. The fix for this vulnerability was released on July 31. Please update immediately.

name: woocommerce-WooPayments-Aug-2023-security-updated
title: Security update of WooPayments (WooCommerce Payments) plugin
content: Your store has been updated to the more secure version of WooPayments (WooCommerce Payments). This update was released on July 31.

name: avalara_q3-2023_noAvaTax
title: Automatically calculate VAT in real time
content: Take the effort out of determining tax rates and sell confidently across borders with automated tax management from Avalara AvaTax— including built-in VAT calculation when you sell into or across the EU and UK. Save time and stay compliant when you let Avalara do the heavy lifting.

name: woo-activation-survey-blockers-22AUG23
title: How can we help you get that first sale?
content: Your feedback is vital. Please take a minute to share your experience of setting up your new store and whether anything is preventing you from making those first few sales. Together, we can make Woo even better!

name: klaviyo_q3_2023
title: Build long lasting relationships with Klaviyo for WooCommerce
content: Increase customer engagement and boost conversions with powerful email and SMS automation from Klaviyo. Fully integrated with your Woo store, Klaviyo enables you to send personalized communications to your customers — ensuring that the right message is delivered at the right time for maximum impact.

name: wc_admin_BNPL_WCPay_Q3_2023
title: Afterpay and Affirm have arrived in WooCommerce Payments!
content: Give your customers more power with buy now, pay later from Afterpay and Affirm — now included as part of WooCommerce Payments! With this new integration, you can quickly offer a checkout option that converts sales and boosts average order value, all from within the same payments dashboard you already know.

name: wc_admin_afterpay_WCPay_Q3_2023
title: Afterpay has arrived in WooCommerce Payments!
content: Give your customers more power with buy now, pay later from Afterpay — now included as part of WooCommerce Payments! With this new integration, you can quickly offer a checkout option that converts sales and boosts average order value, all from within the same payments dashboard you already know.

name: woocommerce-usermeta-Sept2023-productvendors
title: Your store requires a security update
content: Your shop needs an update to address a vulnerability in WooCommerce. The fix was released on Sept 15. Please update WooCommerce to the latest version immediately. Read our developer update for more information.

name: Klarna_10OCT23
title: Klarna is now available
content: This is a test. Klarna is now available.

name: wc-admin-manage-orders-on-the-go
title: Manage your orders on the go
content: Look for orders, customer info, and process refunds in one click with the Woo app.

name: wc_com_in_person_payments_card_sale_US_inbox_note_q4_23
title: Save 35% on a WooPayments card reader
content: Have you been thinking about selling your products or services in person? Now’s the perfect time to do so, as we’re discounting our M2 card readers by 35%! Securely process payments wherever your business takes you, with full store and inventory sync. Don’t miss out — this offer ends October 29, 2023.

name: wc_com_in_person_payments_card_sale_UK_inbox_note_q4_23
title: Save 35% on a WooPayments card reader
content: Have you been thinking about selling your products or services in person? Now’s the perfect time to do so, as we’re discounting our WisePad 3 card readers by 35%! Securely process payments wherever your business takes you, with full store and inventory sync. Don’t miss out — this offer ends 29th October 2023.

name: wc_com_in_person_payments_card_sale_CA_inbox_note_q4_23
title: Save 35% on a WooPayments card reader
content: Have you been thinking about selling your products or services in person? Now’s the perfect time to do so, as we’re discounting our WisePad 3 card readers by 35%! Securely process payments wherever your business takes you, with full store and inventory sync. Don’t miss out — this offer ends October 29, 2023.

name: woocommerce-STRIPE-Oct-2023-update-needed
title: Action required: Security update for WooCommerce Stripe Gateway
content: Your shop requires a security update to address a vulnerability in the WooCommerce Stripe Gateway. The fix for this vulnerability was released on October 17. Please update immediately.

name: wc_admin_WooPay_Q4_2023
title: Convert more sales with our fastest checkout yet
content: Enable WooPay and offer the only single-click checkout experience built by Woo, for Woo. Give shoppers the power to pay instantly and securely speed through checkout, even if it's their first visit. Add it for free with one tap in your WooPayments dashboard.

name: wc_admin_WooPay_Oct30_2023
title: Convert more sales with our fastest checkout yet
content: Enable WooPay and offer the only single-click checkout experience built by Woo, for Woo. Give shoppers the power to pay instantly and securely speed through checkout, even if it's their first visit. Add it for free with one tap in your WooPayments dashboard.

name: paypal_paylater_q4_23
title: Boost your sales this holiday season with PayPal
content: Set yourself up for success this holiday season by allowing customers to pay the way they prefer. With the latest version of PayPal Payments, you can accept PayPal, Venmo (US), Pay Later*, credit and debit cards, and popular alternative payment methods in one secure solution.

name: amazon-mcf-reviews-2023-12-07
title: Enjoying Amazon MCF for WooCommerce?
content: We're Never Settle, the developers behind Amazon MCF for WooCommerce, and would be deeply honored to have your review. Reviews help immensely as other users can learn how MCF can solve their needs too! Not happy or need help? Please reach out for support and we’d love to make things right!

name: wc-admin-performance-on-mobile
title: Track your store performance on mobile
content: Monitor your sales and high performing products with the Woo app.

name: remove_estimated_deposits_2024
title: Estimated deposits are going away
content: To provide more accurate deposit information and support the expansion of instant deposits, estimated deposit details will no longer be available in WooPayments. We recommend upgrading to the latest version of WooPayments for more detailed balance status information.

name: airwallex_q1_2024
title: Save big on foreign exchange (FX) fees
content: Boost your international sales by offering Apple Pay, Google Pay, and 60+ local payment methods with Airwallex. Save time and money by settling payments directly in USD, EUR, HKD, SGD, AUD, and more — without the extra FX fees. Simple, cost-effective, fast.

name: wc-admin-edit-products-on-the-move
title: Edit products on the move
content: Edit and create new products from your mobile devices with the Woo app

name: wc-update-db-reminder
title: WooCommerce database update required
content: WooCommerce has been updated! To keep things running smoothly, we have to update your database to the newest version. The database update process runs in the background and may take a little while, so please be patient. Advanced users can alternatively update via WP CLI.

name: woocommerce-payfast-may-2024-update-needed
title: An important update is required for the Payfast Payment Gateway
content: Please update to the latest version of the Payfast Payment Gateway for WooCommerce immediately to address a security vulnerability. This update is required to ensure that your transactions continue to process.

name: checkout_block_update_july_2024
title: UPDATE: The checkout block is getting an upgrade!
content: We’re improving the checkout block in 2024, starting with WooCommerce 9.0, launching on June 18! The latest release includes streamlined order summary with sticky functionality, better address form layout, and other enhancements to boost conversion.

name: bfcm-survey-jul2024
title: Complete our holiday survey and get a $30 coupon
content:
We want to understand how you prepare your store for Black Friday/Cyber Monday and the holidays.

Complete our 10-minute survey and get $30 USD off an extension from our official Marketplace. Hurry, the survey closes July 15.

name: wnww-recap-july
title: Powerful updates and upgrades in WooCommerce
content: Have you seen all the latest from Woo? Check out our recent roundup for a look at the newest features, extensions, and insights making WooCommerce perform better than ever.

name: paypal_promo_Q4_2024
title: Add PayPal to your existing checkout this holiday season
content: Drive conversion and give customers more confidence to buy when you complement your checkout with PayPal, Venmo, Pay Later, and more. Attract new shoppers and give them a streamlined buying experience with Fastlane, PayPal’s fast and simple guest checkout.

name: sirt-woo-2024-11-xss-admin
title: An important update is required for WooCommerce
content:
This update addresses a security vulnerability that could allow unauthorized access to administrative privileges on your site. Learn more.

Please ensure your site is updated to the latest version to stay secure.

name: usps-mail-service-to-canada-suspended-dec-2024
title: Please note: USPS Mail Service to Canada Suspended
content: The United States Postal Service has temporarily suspended mail service to Canada due to the ongoing Canadian postal workers' strike. USPS is asking users to refrain from mailing items to Canada at this time.

name: Announce-UPS-WCShipping-Dec2024
title: WooCommerce Shipping now supports select UPS services
content: Give customers the power and reliability of UPS, directly from your dashboard. Access discounted rates, convenient shipping options, and fast, on-time delivery with UPS on WooCommerce Shipping — and stay tuned for UPS® Ground Saver rates coming in 2025.

name: woocommerce-analytics-order-attribution-promotions-december-2024
title: Discover what drives your sales
content: Use our powerful Order Attribution extension to understand what truly drives your revenue. Track your sales journey, identify your most effective marketing channels, and optimize your sales strategy.

name: affirm_promo_Q1_2025
title: Save up to 50% on merchant fees with Affirm
content: Kickstart the year with buy now, pay later and get merchant rates as low as 2.9% + 30¢ per transaction for 30 days. Download the extension and complete your application from your WooCommerce dashboard by February 19, 2025 to claim the offer. Terms and conditions apply.

name: new-woo-brand-announcement-feb4-2025
title: Meet the new Woo
content: WooCommerce has a new look, but underneath, we’re still the same customizable, open-source ecommerce platform you know and love. Plus, we’ve got some major improvements to our platform and product on the way.
